mods.name: rm_Total_Moose_Experience
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Contains almost all of my mods into one mod. And some unlreleased edits, or things I'm working on. Infused Chaos not included. GREAT HUNTS! NEW Enhanced Organic Residue Cleaner to cost more, process faster. NEW Improved creature aggressiveness and infighting.

mods.name: rm_3rd_Socket
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_DeployableSetup.  Attempts to restore the third Exotics Extractor socket.

mods.name: rm_Aggression
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_AISetup, D_GOAPSetup.  Take the Bear Cub's aggressive behavior - all carnivores will now mimic this. Included in rm_Angry_Moose.

mods.name: rm_Angry_Moose
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_AISetup, D_AISpawnRules, D_AISpawnZones, D_AutonomousSpawns, D_EpicCreatures.  Mixes some creatures from all maps into all maps, in limited and/or balanced weights. Cubs, Crocodiles, Jaguars, Cougars, Tuskers, Dracs, Shaggy Zebra, and Strikers included. Extremely low chance for some workshop animals in limited areas on OLY & STYX. Added more Exotic Infused creatures to Prometheus. Spawn balances, and MORE balances. Now with +25% more creatures.

mods.name: rm_Buffs_and_Bundles
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_Consumable.  Minor tweaks to a few buffs.  Bundles size improvements.

mods.name: rm_Bulk_Recipes
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_ProcessorRecipes.  Adds bulk recipes for many processor recipes and more.

mods.name: rm_Caveworm_Exotics
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_ItemRewards.  Adds 10% for Caveworms to drop a low amount of Exotics.  This is NOT meant to be any sort of farm.

mods.name: rm_Desired_Drop
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_DropGroups.  Numerous additional Drop Zones.

mods.name: rm_GH_Choices
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_GreatHunts.  Permits completion of all Great Hunts missions per map.

mods.name: rm_Items_Plus
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: RENAME of rm_Filled_Attachments. Edits: D_ItemStatic, D_Durable, D_Fillable.   Increased durability of workshop items, wind turbines, wall defenses. Adds attachments to workshop armor, and some tools/weapons. Adds station repair option to some items. Allows workshop power source to recharge via Charging Station. Pre-filled Workshop Canteens and Oxygen Tanks. Minor oxygen and canteen capacity increases.Some battery powered tool capacity increases.

mods.name: rm_IceBreaker
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: AIGrowth.  IceBreaker, aka Jotunfror, aka Hrimthurs, aka Giant Reindeer, is now Vulnerable. Good luck in slaying the deadly beast.

mods.name: rm_Levels_Character
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_CharacterGrowth.  Displays actual level of player. ZERO additional Character talent points.

mods.name: rm_Levels_Tames
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_CharacterGrowth.  Displays actual level of player and tames/mounts. Increases maximum level of Mounts to 100, and Pets to 50. ZERO additional Character talent points.

mods.name: rm_Meta_Attachments
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_ItemStatic.  All Workshop tools, weapons, and armor shall have Attachment slots.

mods.name: rm_Moar_Power
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_Energy.  Wind Turbine output: 2250.   Solar Panel output: 8000.

mods.name: rm_Modifiers
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_ModifierStates, D_StatAfflictions.  Increased aura radius, including talents, pet talents, and dehumidifiers.  Team Modules effect user.  Exotic Debuff tweaked.

mods.name: rm_No_Ore_Left_Behind
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_Talents, D_VoxelSetupData.  Changes the Waste Not talent to give additional ore instead of stone.  Provides a chance for Exotics when mining Platinum & Titanium.

mods.name: rm_Null_Comms
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_Biomes.  Eliminates the Null Sector's ability to hinder communications.

mods.name: rm_Shifting_Winds
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_ProspectForecast, D_WeatherEvents, D_WeatherPools.  Prometheus weather variety expanded.  Mixed in weather events from other biomes.

mods.name: rm_Stack_Sizes
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_Itemable.  Many improved stack sizes over vanilla.

mods.name: rm_Tracker
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_PlayerTrackers.  For those who want to know how many Dracs they've killed and beyond.  50+ previously untracked items included.  Tracks kills for nearly every creature in the game.  Tracks all buildables crafted, and all decorations crafted.  Half of these values are only visible if you open your Accolades.json file itself and scroll to the bottom: `<Drive:>:\Users\<user>\AppData\Local\Icarus\Saved\PlayerData\<17 digits>`

mods.name: rm_World_Bosses
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Edits: D_Terrains.  Olympus: 4 Black Wolf, and 4 Sandworm. Styx: 4 Giant Scorpion, 4 Black Wolf, and 4 Sandworm. Prometheus: 2 Hammerhead, 1 Lava Hunter.
